aside.div: Allow for the developer to set a write buffer size. The write buffer hooks into khttp_write(3) and, if set to a non-zero size, will cause writes to be buffered. This changes existing behaviour where writes were never buffered. Note that this function is invoked by all writing functions, both within kcgi(3) and its libraries such as kcgijson(3). The buffer is flushed when its size is exceeded or when khttp_free(3) is invoked. The write buffer is built into both the FastCGI and CGI functionality. The buffer size is set in khttp_parsex(3) through a structure that will later hold other tunables. If not provided, the default is 8 KiB for CGI and 65 KiB for FastCGI.
